_sText:
This is a map created for the Christmas event of i3D on the 23th December 2011. After creating it in a very short time i created a fix (v2) that fixed most things.

Information that might help playing the map:
- There are 4 trucks, but only 2 spawnpoints, an admin can do swapteam and teleport to use more trucks if needed.
- The red numbers in the corners of T-spawn are buttons where you can reset the truck, in case of flipping over.
- You have roughly 3,5 minutes to kill all the cts before the nuke strikes and kills the terrorists.
- As terrorists you can use the horn of the truck using your left mouse button.
